reviewDetails.comment: From the beginning, he seemed disinterested in my care or condition. While he did order the necessary tests, he barely explained the results or offered treatment advice. Would not recommend unfortunately

I would certainly recommend Dr. Soumekh -- he is a thoughtful, and caring doctor who answers my questions, and he has a good sense of humor.  The staff who works with him are also all pleasant and work hard to make procedures go smoothly and well.  I would warn, however, that Weil Cornell has a way of doing things which seems geared more for the convenience of the administrators and much less so for the convenience of the patients.
Dr Soumekh was informative and patient while listening to my concerns
Very responsive and is always available to respond to questions
Dr. Soumekh is a great listener who cares about his patients.
Super friendly, informative and easy to work with!
Great visit. Very attentive and informative

reviewDetails.comment: I have been a patient of Dr. Stracher for over 24 years - he had a small office on Park Avenue!  He is the best!!!  Thank you, Dr. Stracher - who I went to for the first time about a pain on my right wrist - preliminary diagnosis was carpal tunnel - Dr. S sent me to an orthopedic (can't recall name) surgeon; blood tests showed I had Lupus.  Here I am 24 years later; Dr. Stracher then recommended Dr. Linda Russell at HSS - she's been my "rheumy" for the last 23 years!  Thank you.
I trust him completely and feel he is an honest and excellent physicians
very pragmatic and straightforward
He is the consummate professional.

reviewDetails.comment: She's a knowledgeable Doctor who I trust for proper treatment of my condition. It's my understanding that she isn't accepting new patients however.
very friendly and listens to your concerns
Terrific doctor. Thorough, compassionate, organized, gives you her complete attention, caring, listens.  Excellent follow through.
She’s a wonderful doctor some one that listen to you and advise on your health.

Dr. Lowenstein is the most compassionate and careful primary care physician I have ever known. She is willing to go above and beyond with her patients. I have always been 100% confident with her medical care and advice.

Dr. Loewenstein is one of the best!  She is very caring, thorough and tough when she needs to be.  I never have any worries about sharing medical concerns with her and she always does her best to ease any fears I may have.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Baker is an extraordinary physician. He genuinely cares and communicates well.  His office and staff, as well as the patient portal, are exemplary. Highest recommendation. Five stars!
He's the best!

Dr Baker is an exceptional endocrinologist! He always takes time to listen and talk with you so you feel like you are not just a number but a patient who matters. Recommend him and Dr Lash to family or friends!
Dr.baker is the best doctor that I have ever seen
Dr. Baker has perfect bedside manner, is patient, has a good sense of humor and is extremely knowledgeable. I highly recommend him to anyone who needs a great endocrinologist!
Dr. Baker is great.  He listens and works with you to recommend a treatment that makes sense based on your condition.  He communicates really well and is very nice.  I would recommend him to anyone.
Dr Baker is very professional he listens to everything you tell him . Dr Baker also explains Results clearly . He is also friendly .

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Hate was so good with my little one. This is the first doctor visit where he barely cried! Dr Hate was also very thorough through the visit. I highly recommend him.

Horrible bed side manners.
My son and I were made to feel like a second rate citizens. Wouldn’t even allow me to bring my carriage in let alone put my son on the examination table to be examined properly. He basically worried about his own well being rather than well being of a small child.

Incredibly engaging and sweet.  Our kids actually look forward to going to the doctor!  Last week he gave my daughter 3 injections and she didn't even cry - thanks to how much he was making her laugh.
Dr Hate is good with our kids, and everyone in the office is very nice. They've always been accommodating when we have had emergency requests.
Dr. Hate is a caring DR who has guided us through my son's development.
